page.name: Hunter's Wrath
page.description:
Dont underestimate the power of sticking a red-hot blade into an opponents face.  Yulgar knew this, and thats why he made this dagger the way he did.
This item requires a Dragon Amulet.

properties.name: Hunter's Wrath
properties.description:
Dont underestimate the power of sticking a red-hot blade into an opponents face.  Yulgar knew this, and thats why he made this dagger the way he did.

page.name: Frenzy at the Forge
page.description: The smell of Yulgar's strawberry smoothies have attracted the local wildlife into town, including the ferocious boar Zeuster has sent you to hunt!

properties.name: Frenzy at the Forge
properties.description: The smell of Yulgar's strawberry smoothies have attracted the local wildlife into town, including the ferocious boar Zeuster has sent you to hunt!
properties.complete: It's hard to be bored when animals are going wild.  You might want to help Yulgar clean up his forge, too, since he DID make the smoothies for you.
